item.title: Accenture states that just-in-time marketing leads to higher conversion rates
item.description:
Source: Accenture infographic. A recent report from Accenture, based on a survey of over 500 chief marketing officers (CMOs) globally, suggests that just-in-time marketing can lead to a greater return on investment and significantly boost revenue growth. Companies using this method are three times more likely to surpass their competitors in terms of revenue growth. Just-in-time marketing focuses on crafting relevant marketing content precisely when needed and tailoring it to appeal to interested consumers at the exact moment they are ready to make a purchase...
